---
name: 内容补充
about: 提出需要新增内容的建议
title: '[内容补充]'
labels: enhancement
---

## 想补充什么内容 / What would you like to add
- 请描述要新增的内容或功能。
  Describe the new content or feature you'd like to add.

## 为什么需要这项补充 / Why is this needed
- 这个补充带来什么价值？和现有内容如何搭配？
  What value does it bring and how does it fit with existing content?

## 提供的参考 / 草图 / 示例 / References/Sketches
- 
  Attach any references, mockups, or examples.

## 预期效果 / Expected Outcome
- 
  Describe what success looks like.

> 一次 issue 只针对一个补充点，便于 reviewer 快速判断是否合并。
